title: 820-2850-A Has green light and fan but No chime, No video
message:
I am new here but have a 820-2850-A that has green light and fan spin but that is it. No chime, No video. Where should I start? There is no liquid damage.

also wanted to note that a usb mouse does not light up when plugged in

title: 820-2850-A Has green light and fan but No chime, No video
820-2850-A Has green light and fan but No chime, No video
820-2850-A Has green light and fan but No chime, No video
message: Remove RAM and see if machine beeps. Case speaker needs to be connected. Any history on this board? This kind of failure usually doesn't "just" happen.

title: 820-2850-A Has green light and fan but No chime, No video
message:
Yes it does beep when ram is removed. I do hear the HD spin up not sure if that matters. When i plug usb mouse in it lights for a fraction of a second during the plugin process and then goes off

Sorry no history on this computer. I got this in a bulk lot

title: 820-2850-A Has green light and fan but No chime, No video
message: Are you using known good PC8500 RAM? Try 1 slot at a time. Inspect board for damage and corrosion.
